snippet: The headquarters of the North American Aerospace Defense Command in Colorado were evacuated for about four and a half hours on Thursday after employees found five suspicious packages.
abstract: Headquarters of North American Aerospace Defense Command in Colorado are evacuated for about four and a half hours after employees find five suspicious packages; control room team works at backup location and no essential missions are disrupted.
lead_paragraph: The headquarters of the North American Aerospace Defense Command in Colorado were evacuated for about four and a half hours on Thursday after employees found five suspicious packages.
